title: Live Lyrics Finder
description: Real-time lyrics synced with Spotify playback.
details: Built with React and Tailwind CSS, this app uses the Spotify API to fetch and display lyrics in sync with the currently playing song.

title: MAASS
description: A gesture-controlled, multilingual AI chatbot that responds to voice, hand signals, and textâ€”no login required.
details: Integrates MediaPipe for gesture recognition and Gemini API for natural language processing, supporting multiple input methods.

title: ASL Letter Recognizer
description: A real-time American Sign Language letter detection system using MediaPipe and TensorFlow for live webcam input.
details: Uses Python, OpenCV, and TensorFlow to detect ASL letters from webcam input with high accuracy in real-time.

title: Text Summarizer
description: A Python-based NLP project to summarize long texts using techniques like frequency-based and BERT-based models.
details: Implements TextRank and BERT models for efficient text summarization, ideal for processing large documents.

title: AeroTrack
description: A hyperlocal air quality visualizer and forecasting system built with React, Flutter, and AI/ML technologies.
details: AeroTrack combines real-time AQI data, satellite overlays, and AI-based forecasting to deliver meaningful air quality insights. It supports map heatmaps, predictive analytics, health tips, reverse geocoding, offline PWA support, and emergency response features for underserved regions.

title: Secret Surveillance Tool
description: Real-time video surveillance with CSS filters for educational cybersecurity exploration.
details: Built with Express.js, Socket.IO, and WebRTC, this app streams live video from a client to an admin panel, applying CSS filters (e.g., black & white, blur, sunny) to the client view. Snapshots with filters are sent to the admin and downloaded locally. Developed for learning ethical hacking and cybersecurity concepts. **Disclaimer**: For educational purposes only; the creator is not liable for misuse.

title: Vulnerability Assessment & Defacement Detection Platform
description: An integrated GUI platform to assess website vulnerabilities, detect defacement, and scan Android apps for misconfigurations or malicious content.
details: Frontend built with React for a user-friendly interface and backend powered by Express.js. Supports website scanning (headers, SSL, cookies, ports, JS libraries, directory listing, robots/sitemap checks) and Android APK analysis (permissions, manifest, exported components). Generates detailed PDF reports with mitigation steps.

title: PatchSense
description: AI-assisted vulnerability risk prioritization dashboard that goes beyond CVSS to support smarter patching decisions.
details: PatchSense analyzes CVE data from NVD using machine learning to predict exploitation likelihood and combines it with asset exposure and criticality to compute a final risk score. The system outputs ranked vulnerabilities and weekly patch plans via a React-based dashboard. Designed as a scalable cybersecurity analytics platform with a clear separation between ML inference and frontend visualization.
